name: Match.AI
tagline: REST API for Personality Match Indices
body:
### Prelude
The present online review system is broken. Each personâ€™s likings and preferences are different. These personality traits play a key role in a review.

### What is Match.AI ?
Match.AI is a REST API built over IBM Bluemix's Personality Insights Service.

### What does Match.AI do ?
Match.AI uses a custom algorithm on top of Watson's PI service to generate a *PMI Rating* - _*Personality Match Index*_ based on the user's personality.
It uses [Facebook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api) to get social context of a user.
[IBM Bluemix's Personality Insights Service](https://console.ng.bluemix.net/catalog/services/personality-insights/) derives insights from transactional and social media data to identify psychological traits which determine purchase decisions, intent and behavioural traits.

### Authors and Contributors
@whiteboardmonk @amrithyerramilli built this at [xHacknight](http://blog.xhackers.co/xhacknight-powered-by-ibm-bluemix-and-xamarin/)
